description.raw:
A recent [homebrew pull request](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/pull/14408) does not provide the `pip` command with the `python` formula, but it is renamed as `pip2`. This caused a [build failure](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/246/):

~~~
++ pip install lxml
./scripts/jenkins-scripts/lib/project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash: line 74: pip: command not found
~~~

A [test build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/247) has passed this step successfully.
description.html:
A recent homebrew pull request does not provide the pip command with the python formula, but it is renamed as pip2. This caused a build failure:

++ pip install lxml
./scripts/jenkins-scripts/lib/project-default-devel-homebrew-amd64.bash: line 74: pip: command not found

A test build has passed this step successfully.

title.raw: use pip2 on brew, since homebrew python only links a versioned binary
title.html: use pip2 on brew, since homebrew python only links a versioned binary
